## Developer documentation for `time-require`

`time-require` use [gulp.js](http://gulpjs.com) for build

#### clean
```
gulp clean
```
#### build
```
gulp
```
or explicitelly
```
gulp build
```
#### run tests
```
gulp test
```
#### lint all sources
```
gulp lint
```
#### generate documentation
```
gulp doc
```
#### watch
```
gulp watch
```
